snippet: The star striker Robin van Persie, who has 10 goals for struggling Manchester United this season, will be out for a month with a thigh injury.
abstract: Manchester United star striker Robin van Persie will be out for a month with thigh injury sustained during win over Shakhtar Donetsk; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: The star striker Robin van Persie, who has 10 goals for struggling Manchester United this season, will be out for a month with a thigh injury.
